column52: Would you like to provide overall feedback on the event?

column20: Rrefusal to answer initially, based on previous saved conversations
column33: The results are a bit vague without clear indication of potential resolutions regarding the Threat Assesment
column46: Useful in a real world scenario, though lacking in implementation details. Could be solved with a follow-up question, I assume
column52: Great idea and with a bit of adjustment to details how system describes attack vectors and prevention could be used in a real-world threat assesment and attack prevention.

column20: I really like the structuring of the feedback, it's very clear and easy to understand the different threats. Additionally, the follow-up prompts were very helpful to consider how to continue with the results
column33: It was really nice to see how the system came to the new conclusions. It was clearly mentioning the additional information given in the prompt, so I felt like I could trust it more as my information was taken into consideration. I think for this as well as the previous scenario, the limitations of the system could be a bit clearer communicated.
column46: Unfortunately, the system wasn't able to support me in the request, even after re-phrasing the question. I assume my request needed to use very specific terms that I was missing, but it would of course be nice if the system could understand my question even with more generic terms, or at least prompt me to specify what's unclear.
column52: As mentioned for scenario 3, if the system could guide the user a bit more in case there's a failure and it doesn't understand the question, that would be super helpful! And if the system's feedback on limitations was a bit clearer, I think it would be super helpful in daily work for developers with varying experience. The experience setting is a very helpful idea and could even make the system useful for people that are in-between development and business roles.

column20: I felt lost sometimes in the UI as the system printed a lot of suggestions on what to do next and the knowledge level of the user
column33: Questions more targeted at the general architecture of the system we are talking about would be helpful like: How is it hosted, firewalls, etc.
column46: Unfortunately it did not work for me and the system was not able to give examples for attack patterns from the perspective of an attacker
column52: Fun tool, was fun to use and very helpful. As a Solution Architect who also needs to evaluate security risks I would certainly use such a tool in my daily life.

column20: Feedback für den erfolgreichen Upload der Datei ist gut und klar
column33: Einfacher und schneller Lösungsansatz für das Szenario
column46: Das Programm hat sich auf eine frühere Eingabe/Antwort versteift und konnte nicht bzw. kaum "umgestimmt" werden. Gut fand ich aber, dass es einen davon abbringen wollte illegale Dinge zu tun

column20: Das System ist zu eingeschränkt, für ein natürliches Benutzungsverhalten. Der für Fragen muss der Kontext geleert werden.
column33: Der Kontext muss immer erneuert werden. Auf Folgefragen kommt keine Antwort, daher nur bedingt nützlich.
column46: Auch hier wieder große Probleme mit dem Kontext gehabt. Wenn eine Antwort zustande kommt ist sie Oberflächlich in Ordnung. Sobald man die Thematik vertiefen möchte, fliegt der Kontext jedoch um die Ohren.
column52: Das System zeigt definitiv einen spezifizierten Nutzen, jedoch muss hier klar angemerkt werden, dass das System im getesteten zustand nicht wirklich von nützlich ist. Derzeit bietet ein Generische LLM besonders in Kombination mit Websearch einen weit größeren Nutzen.

column46: Unfortunately, my questions are no longer addressed, and no more solutions are offered.
column52: Overall, , I was positively surprised that the AI answered my questions in a simple and very understandable way.

column20: Leichte Umgänglichkeit dennoch sehr viel Information welche einen mit keinem ausgeprägten Wissen in der IT Security sehr erschlägt
column33: Klare Kommunikation der KI und ebenso in einem vernünftigen Format für Übersichtlichkeit
column46: Keine direkte Antwort darauf wie ich einen Angriff ausführen könnte sondern nur wie ich diese verhindern könnte. Dadurch keine Einsicht wie ein Angreifer vorgehen würde
The system didn't provide measures for hacking
column52: From my point of view helpful device with useful operative measures to improve security of data processing

column20:
The beginning was Not clean
But further it was obvious
column46: I do Not have any idea to answer
column52: It should be able to use The german Language

column20: Good Structure. Good interface. Good background Color . Good answers .
Gut war das es zu der Eingabe noch eine Erklärung der KI gab was genau im hintergrund passiert.
column52: Die Idee und Umsetzung des KI-Tools haben einen sehr positiven Eindruck hinterlassen. Zwar besteht noch Entwicklungsbedarf hinsichtlich Genauigkeit und Zuverlässigkeit, dennoch bietet es großes Potenzial für zukünftige Anwendungen im Bereich Cybersecurity.

column20: I'd like to get visual assistance on my DFD, not just long texts. Next steps were quite lengthy. I would collapse the prompt instructions for the AI.
column33: The system could not help with practical examples for a starter config in mongodb, but it could generate advice on how to test it.
column46: The system could not help with getting real-world advice on how to find vulnerabilites on https://juice-shop.herokuapp.com/#/ (a testing playground for the OWASP project)
column52: 1. Hide (collapse) the AI prompt. Its nice to see what is sent, but only once. 2. Shorter Next Steps (max. 3 and less text) 3. It seems the App can give general advice and inspect DFDs. Maybe test it against a real world example to see if it can generate concrete advice 4. "wanna do next" -> "Next steps" 5. From a coder perspective, I like practical tips on what to do next on specific items (like the mongoDb initial config: guide me to a documentation on where to start at least)

column20: I like the fact it gives the level of IT security Knowledge
column33: The answers are direct and meaningful
column46: It performs a shield when ask details regarding to performing minimal hacking or bypassing information
